pullrequest.title: issue #16, update gazebo xacro so camera topic matches hardware (e.g. /sandia_hands/l_hand/camera/left/image_raw --> /sandia_hands/l_hand/left/image_raw).

content.raw: i don't know the implications this has on downstream simulation users, but it looks good to me. My apologies for not having the hardware driver match what you did in simulation; the naming convention in the simulator was better than what I did in hardware, but at this point, I think there may be more hardware users than simulation users (? not clear), so I think this is a good change to make.
